rows.label: qev095302_MSG0001
rows.name: I think you should go first. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095302_MSG0002
rows.name: No, no. After you. Be my guest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095302_MSG0003
rows.name:
Now wait a minute! *fsssh* Any of us who goes out
alone is just going to be eaten.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095302_MSG0004
rows.name: I say we all go and carry out the mission together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095302_MSG0005
rows.name: Yes. *fsssh* That way ALL of us can be eaten![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095302_MSG0006
rows.name: Perhaps, but we can't just abandon our duty, either.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095302_MSG0007
rows.name:
If we show up empty-handed with zero survey results,
the Ganglion will have our hides! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095302_MSG0008
rows.name: We're dead if we do, dead if we don't...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095302_MSG0009
rows.name:
Ooo, I know! *fsssh* Why don't we just stay huddled
here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095302_MSG0010
rows.name: *fsssh* Oh ho! A creative solution![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095302_MSG0011
rows.name:
And a feat only a race as adaptable to any
environment as we are could manage. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095302_MSG0012
rows.name:
We'll wait them out here, whether it takes a century or
two or thr—WAUGH![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095302_MSG0013
rows.name: H-h-human! Over there! Human![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095302_MSG0014
rows.name: Then it's all over... *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095302_JNK0010
rows.name: Assure

rows.label: qev095302_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell them that you mean no harm.

rows.label: qev095302_JNK0020
rows.name: Interrogate

rows.label: qev095302_SEL0021
rows.name: Demand to know their purpose here.

rows.label: qev095302_MSG0015
rows.name: It seems like a...friendly human? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095302_MSG0016
rows.name:
Perhaps if we obey the human, [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] will save us from
this predicament?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095302_MSG0017
rows.name:
Bah! And then we exchange one master for another!
*fsssh* What makes this one any more trustworthy?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095302_MSG0018
rows.name: What should we d—WAUGH![ST:wait ][ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095302_MSG0019
rows.name: Hey! What are you slackers doing?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095302_MSG0020
rows.name:
You're Ganglion soldiers, aren't you?!
So take up your guns and fight![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095302_MSG0021
rows.name:
Er, but we're noncombatants. Running away is sort of
what we...do. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095302_MSG0022
rows.name: Tsk! This is why your kind will always be grunts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095302_MSG0023
rows.name: Urk... The human has a dangerous glint in [ST:gender p1=his p2=her ] eyes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095302_MSG0024
rows.name:
Those are the eyes of someone who walked here over
a thousand Ganglion corpses! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095302_MSG0025
rows.name: Why are you cowards standing there sniveling?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095302_MSG0026
rows.name: W-we're saved![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095302_MSG0027
rows.name:
You're Ganglion soldiers, aren't you?
So take up your guns and fight![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095302_MSG0028
rows.name:
Er, but we're noncombatants. Running away is sort of
what we...do. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095302_MSG0029
rows.name: Tsk! This is why your kind will always be grunts.[ST:wait ]
